mapper.select: select h.station_id id,s.name,h.message,DATE_FORMAT(h.lastTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') lastTime from Heart h left join station s on h.station_id=s.id where h.number=3 order by h.lastTime asc

select open1.name,open1.month,open2.year from (( select res.station_id,count(station_id) as month,station.name from res_openingdate res left join station on res.station_id=station.id where DATE_FORMAT(res.time,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m')
and station_id in
#{item}
group by 1) open1 left join ( select res1.station_id,count(station_id) as year,station.name from res_openingdate res1 left join station on res1.station_id=station.id where DATE_FORMAT(res1.time,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y')
and station_id in
#{item}
group by 1 ) open2 on open1.station_id=open2.station_id)
